description: Task management application built using the ZenReact framework

coding_standards.file_structure: One component per file with index.ts exports
coding_standards.styling: Tailwind CSS utility classes with DaisyUI components
coding_standards.testing: Component tests with Vitest and React Testing Library

features.name: Task Management
features.description: Create, view, update, delete tasks with filtering

features.name: User Profile
features.description: User profile management and application settings

mandatory_sequence: Context Assessment - Complete contextual analysis BEFORE any implementation
Documentation Review - Document current project state and progress
Planning Phase - Create detailed implementation plan
Rule Validation - Verify against ZenTask standards
Quality Validation - Verify implementation meets standards
enforcement_mechanisms: Stop Statement - If implementing without planning, STOP IMMEDIATELY
Context Check - Before coding, verify context assessment is complete
Plan Verification - Verify detailed plan exists before implementation
Implementation Checklist - Use checklists to verify quality
required_documentation: feature-specific context files - For each feature
ai-implementation-sequence.md - Mandatory process for AI agents
